thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great view of Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: Great view of Eiffel Tower - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: carlosrfigueredo
title: Great view of Eiffel Tower
text: We have stayed at this hotel twice now for special occasions once in November 2016 and for one night for Valentines in 2017 because of its great location and the uninterrupted view of the Eiffel Tower that it provides from the rooms balcony when specified with reception. The concierge was very helpful as well with booking us reservations at all the restaurants we wanted to eat. Can easily walk to the Champs Elysees, Rue Saint Honre which has great designer shopping, the famous Angelina cafe which is a must when in Paris and the beautiful Jardin de Tuileries.
